Operation 'mbus_api' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context. Missing summary entirely. Description is vague ('this API specification'). data.description_suggestion: Returns the complete OpenAPI specification for the M-Bus HTTPD API, including all available endpoints, parameters, schemas, and response formats.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is vague ('this API specification'). Improved version clarifies that it returns OpenAPI specification and explains what information is included, helping AI agents understand the operation's utility for discovering API capabilities.

message: Operation 'hat' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about what information is returned. Enhanced version specifies that it returns status and configuration details, and mentions power state and hardware capabilities, improving AI agent understanding of the response content.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current status and configuration information of the Raspberry Pi Hat connected to the M-Bus HTTPD device, including power state and hardware capabilities.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about what information is returned. Enhanced version specifies that it returns status and configuration details, and mentions power state and hardware capabilities, improving AI agent understanding of the response content.

message: Operation 'hatOn' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description lacks context about side effects and return value. Improved version explains the purpose (enabling M-Bus communication), the effect on subsequent operations, and clarifies what is returned, enabling AI agents to understand when this operation is necessary.

data.current_description: Turns on power to the M-Bus
data.summary_suggestion: Enable M-Bus power via Raspberry Pi Hat
data.description_suggestion: Enables power to the M-Bus interface through the Raspberry Pi Hat. This operation activates the M-Bus communication interface, allowing subsequent read/scan operations to function. Returns confirmation of the power state change.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks context about side effects and return value. Improved version explains the purpose (enabling M-Bus communication), the effect on subsequent operations, and clarifies what is returned, enabling AI agents to understand when this operation is necessary.

message: Operation 'hatOff' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description lacks context about side effects and return value. Improved version explains the purpose, clarifies that it prevents further operations, and indicates what is returned, helping AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

data.current_description: Turns off power to the M-Bus
data.summary_suggestion: Disable M-Bus power via Raspberry Pi Hat
data.description_suggestion: Disables power to the M-Bus interface through the Raspberry Pi Hat. This operation deactivates the M-Bus communication interface, preventing further read/scan operations until power is restored. Returns confirmation of the power state change.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks context about side effects and return value. Improved version explains the purpose, clarifies that it prevents further operations, and indicates what is returned, helping AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

message: Operation 'scan' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't explain what is returned or prerequisites. Enhanced version clarifies the parameters' roles, specifies the output format (list of addresses and status), and notes the power requirement, improving AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Scan the specified device for slaves
data.summary_suggestion: Scan M-Bus device for connected slaves
data.description_suggestion: Scans the M-Bus device specified by {device} at the given {baudrate} to discover all connected slave devices. Returns a list of detected slave addresses and their availability status. Requires the M-Bus interface to be powered on.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't explain what is returned or prerequisites. Enhanced version clarifies the parameters' roles, specifies the output format (list of addresses and status), and notes the power requirement, improving AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about return format and address types. Improved version clarifies that data is returned as XML, explains what the XML contains, and notes support for different address types, enabling AI agents to understand the response format and address requirements.

data.current_description: Gets data from the slave identified by {address}
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve M-Bus data from slave device
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves M-Bus data from a single slave device identified by {address} on the specified {device} at the given {baudrate}. Returns the slave's data as an XML document containing meter readings and device information. Supports both primary and secondary slave addresses.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about return format and address types. Improved version clarifies that data is returned as XML, explains what the XML contains, and notes support for different address types, enabling AI agents to understand the response format and address requirements.

message: Operation 'getMulti' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description is vague about what 'multiple responses' means and lacks detail about {maxframes} parameter usage. Enhanced version clarifies that it handles segmented data across multiple frames, explains the {maxframes} parameter's role, specifies the output format, and indicates use cases, improving AI agent understanding of when to use this operation versus the single-frame 'get' operation.

data.current_description: Gets data from the slave identified by {address}, and supports multiple responses from the slave
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve multiple M-Bus responses from slave
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves M-Bus data from a slave device identified by {address} on the specified {device} at the given {baudrate}, listening for up to {maxframes} response frames. Returns multiple XML documents if the slave sends segmented data. Useful for devices that transmit data across multiple frames. Supports both primary and secondary slave addresses.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about what 'multiple responses' means and lacks detail about {maxframes} parameter usage. Enhanced version clarifies that it handles segmented data across multiple frames, explains the {maxframes} parameter's role, specifies the output format, and indicates use cases, improving AI agent understanding of when to use this operation versus the single-frame 'get' operation.
